mapper.select: select count(*) from room_schedule where room_id = 1 and (start_time <= #{startTime} and end_time > #{startTime}) or (start_time <= #{endTime} and end_time > #{endTime})
mapper.insert: insert into room_schedule (room_id, start_time, end_time) values (#{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update room_schedule
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
